formal_name:
Nintendo presents:
New Style Boutique™ 2 - Fashion Forward
description:
In this Nintendo 3DS game, players take on five different roles to become the star of the entire fashion business. Players can run their own fashion boutique and pick out the perfect outfits for any visitors to their shop, or style their customers' hair and make-up. They can also design their own clothes or become a successful model.

This game may contain product placement and advertising.



Visit amiibo.nintendo.eu for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.
name:
Nintendo presents:
New Style Boutique™ 2
